titles.title: A bill to provide for a temporary increase in the public debt limit.

action.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.
Committee Consideration and Mark-up Session Held.
Reported to House by House Committee on Ways and Means. Report No: 100-88.
Committee on Rules Granted a Modified Closed Rule Providing One Hour of General Debate; Waiving All Points of Order.
Rules Committee Resolution H.Res.165 Reported to House.
Called up by House by Rule.

vote.text: Passed House by Yea-Nay Vote: 296 - 124 (Record Vote No: 117).

calendar.text: Received in the Senate. Read twice. Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 125.

action.text: Measure laid before Senate by unanimous consent.

vote.text: Passed Senate without amendment by Yea-Nay Vote. 58-36. Record Vote No: 111.

action.text: Message on Senate action sent to the House.

bill.summary: 5/11/1987--Introduced. Increases the public debt limit through July 17, 1987, to $2,320,000,000,000. Repeals a provision of the Omnibus Budget Reconciliation Act of 1986 temporarily increasing the public debt limit.
